name: Breksta's Cat
description:
Breksta's Cat

How important are dreams? How often do you remember something from them? Did you ever have a dream you wish you hadn't woken up from?

What if you've been cursed not to leave the dream's world (which isn't necessarily the world of your dreams) until you will have fulfilled your given mission in that world?

Of course, you'd have to do it. It's Valnyssa's order.

Noticeable or not to the common human's spiritual blind eye, dreams and reality interact with each other in some sort of metaphysical ecosystem. They feed each other. They rely on each other. If the dreams' world is threatened by demonic creatures (as it happens from time to time), so will the human's world. Both dreams and reality must reach a state of fusion and harmony in order to become more powerful and survive any potential destructive attacks.

Just like dreams are guiding humans' existence through the power of blessing and inspiration, it is your turn to become one with the world of dreams, Ethereal, and stop it from vanishing into Nowhere.

Aand... no. Don't expect, don't even think that you're going to knock out demons in some way related to Mortal Kombat fights. Dreams are too refined and rational worlds to be trated with brutality. Instead, you'll have to use your logic and patience...

Actually, you know what? I won't say anything. Just try it yourself. The download button is right on this page below.

Maybe you'll want to also check the Github repository of this game.

You may also want to take a look at my HomebrewOwl.GB collection.

If you're stuck or you prefer to watch a gameplay rather than actually playing the game, check the video below (Warning: Spoilers ahead!).
